t: Caron & Doucet | About Us – Caron & Doucet | USA
s: Caron & Doucet is a family owned & operated business with headquarters in the Laurentian town of Morin-Heights, Quebec. The brand was conceptualized in early 2013 by Pamela and Stephen Caron as a spin-off of their family skincare business, Olive Authentique (established in 2001).
